com.onedevapp.nativeplugin.share

Class ShareManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.onedevapp.nativeplugin.share.ShareManager

  • public class ShareManager
extends java.lang.Object
    ShareManager is the responsible class for sharing Text or Files. Currently Supports Text and Image files to System Default with single or multiple files Can sends to WhatApp with default or to Specific User if provided mobile no exists
